name: middle_bad
note:
<Custom Row Condition>
condition = false;
weapon = $dataWeapons[user._equips[0]._itemId]
weapon1 = $dataWeapons[user._equips[1]._itemId]
if(weapon!=null){
if(weapon.note.match(/<(?:front)>/i)) condition = true;
if(weapon.note.match(/<(?:back)>/i)) condition = true;
} else {
condition = true
}
if(user._equips[1]._dataClass=="weapon"){
if(weapon1.note.match(/<(?:front)>/i)) condition = true;
if(weapon1.note.match(/<(?:back)>/i)) condition = true;
}


</Custom Row Condition>

name: back_bad
note:
<Custom Row Condition>
condition = false;
weapon = $dataWeapons[user._equips[0]._itemId]
weapon1 = $dataWeapons[user._equips[1]._itemId]
if(weapon!=null){
if(weapon.note.match(/<(?:front)>/i)) condition = true;
if(weapon.note.match(/<(?:middle)>/i)) condition = true;
} else {
condition = true
}
if(user._equips[1]._dataClass=="weapon"){
if(weapon1.note.match(/<(?:front)>/i)) condition = true;
if(weapon1.note.match(/<(?:middle)>/i)) condition = true;
}
</Custom Row Condition>

name: front_bad
note:
<Custom Row Condition>
condition = false;
if(user.isActor()&&user._equips[0]){
weapon = $dataWeapons[user._equips[0]._itemId]
weapon1 = $dataWeapons[user._equips[1]._itemId]
if(weapon!=null){
if(weapon.note.match(/<(?:middle)>/i)) condition = true;
if(weapon.note.match(/<(?:back)>/i)) condition = true;
} else {
condition = false
}
if(user._equips[1]._dataClass=="weapon"){
if(weapon1.note.match(/<(?:middle)>/i)) condition = true;
if(weapon1.note.match(/<(?:back)>/i)) condition = true;
}
}
</Custom Row Condition>
